Name: Liyue Harbor Wharf
Title: Where All Ships Dock
Desc: "Nature provides, the mountains rejoice, we are blessed by heaven's good grace."
Source: Reward for accepting Uncle Tian's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
